rows.label: qev040502_MSG0004
rows.name:
Moimoi will complete Legen-dar no matter what.
And also best pair of Infinigoggles ever,
if friend can gather the materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0005
rows.name:
BLADE friend and Moimoi will send Muimui off on
quest for Nopon Sword of Legendaryness together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nasty terebra that ate Legen-dar should still be near
Biahno Lake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0007
rows.name:
It is huge greedy-guts, so be careful it doesn't gobble
friend up, too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ooooor if friend would rather just put up 30,000
credits to build new Legen-dar, Moimoi can start
work right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_JNK0010
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qev040502_SEL0011
rows.name: Give Moimoi 30,000 credits.

rows.label: qev040502_JNK0020
rows.name: Hunt

rows.label: qev040502_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Moimoi that you will slay the terebra.

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thank you, friend! Making another one is easy so long
as Moimoi has money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0010
rows.name:
So brave! So BLADE! Moimoi will be here waiting
for good news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0011
rows.name:
Moimoi will get started straightaway.
Just wait one second![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Done! Would friend do honors and give this to
Muimui?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0013
rows.name:
Urgh! That smell! Did friend manage to get Legen-dar
back from horrible, stinky terebra?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0014
rows.name: Thank you! Now to give few final adjustments...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Done! Would friend do honors and give this to
Muimui?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0016
rows.name:
Moimoi confident his brotherpon will find Sword of
Legendaryness with little trouble![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0017
rows.name:
Nothing is impossible with inventioning of Moimoi
and adventuring spirit of Muimui.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0018
rows.name:
Finding sword will prove that once and for all.
...And make us rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0019
rows.name: Meh-meh? BLADE friend does not have the money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040502_MSG0020
rows.name:
Gather 30,000 credits or beat Legen-dar out of terebra,
whichever is easier. ...Oh, and faster would be nice.[ST:wait ]
